def has_faucet(sink:item):
    # Determine whether this sink has a faucet
    symbol has_faucet=exists faucet:item: is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
    return has_faucet

behavior fill_pot_with_water(pot:item, sink:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(pot)
        # Hold the pot temporarily

        achieve inside(pot, sink)
        # Place the pot inside the sink

        if has_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            # If the sink has a faucet, turn it on to fill the pot with water

        achieve has_water(pot)
        # Ensure the pot has water

        if has_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)
            # If the sink has a faucet, turn it off after filling the pot
